Product: Shure SE215-CL Clear Sound Isolating In-Ear Headphones & RMCE Remote +...
Reviews: I love how easy they are to use and they are what most of our production team use. I did not get the mic cable or splitter with the bundle as described. Very disappointed. If I just wanted headphones with extra buds, I wouldn't have paid the extra amount. Cb

Product: Shure SE215-CL Clear Sound Isolating In-Ear Headphones & RMCE Remote +...
Reviews: Headsphones are fantastic, exceeded expectations. Seller did not initially send splitter cable, but has been responsive and I expect this to be resolved shortly.

Product: Shure SE215-CL Clear Sound Isolating In-Ear Headphones & RMCE Remote +...
Reviews: The headphones, thankfully, came in as promised as well as the mic and remote. However, I did not get the jack splitter y-cable in my package which is disappointing because I paid for them too.
